fields.name: InstanceCloseDelayDuration
fields.description: Delay duration for RequestDrain feature to ensures that the endpoint advertised by the stateless instance is removed before the delay starts prior to closing the instance. This delay enables existing requests to drain gracefully before the instance actually goes down (https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/service-fabric/service-fabric-application-upgrade-advanced#avoid-connection-drops-during-stateless-service-planned-downtime-preview). It is represented in ISO 8601 format (hh:mm:ss.s).
